com.android.launcher.permission.INSTALL_.description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

android.permission.READ_LOGS.description: Allows an application to read from the system's various log files. This allows it to discover general information about what you are doing with the phone, potentially including personal or private information.

com.ximalaya.ting.himalaya.permission.C2.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.description: Allows an application to move tasks to the foreground and background. Malicious applications can force themselves to the front without your control.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows an application to view configuration of the local Bluetooth phone and to make and accept connections with paired devices.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.ximalaya.ting.himalaya.activity.MainPortalActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.ximalaya.ting.himalaya.activity.MainPortalActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

Service (com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.RevocationBoundService) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.permission.REVOCATION_NOTIFICATION
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Service is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

binary_analysis.title: Found elf built without Position Independent Executable (PIE) flag
binary_analysis.desc: In order to prevent an attacker from reliably jumping to, for example, a particular exploited function in memory, Address space layout randomization (ASLR) randomly arranges the address space positions of key data areas of a process, including the base of the executable and the positions of the stack, heap and libraries. Built with option -pie.

playstore_details.title: Himalaya - Free Podcast Player/FM/AM for Android
playstore_details.description:
🎧Himalaya is a top podcast app for Android to stream more than 24 million episodes. Discover the best podcasts and your next favorite show. The free app recommends podcasts, radio, and audio content in various categories like true crime, news, politics, tech and more. 

Features 
• Podcast sleep timer ⏰so you can fall asleep to a show
• High quality audio and ad-free podcast player 🔈
• Personalized homepage with newest episodes of your favorite popular podcasts 
• Customizable playlist cover image
• Browse by categories (such as true crime and news), featured, top chart and listening history
• Follow your favorite podcasts and podcast creators
• Search for podcast episodes and shows in English, Chinese & Japanese
• 500,000 podcasters, 270,000 podcasts, 24 million episodes
• Keep all your favorite podcasts in one app with import from Google podcast, Soundcloud, Castbox, iHeartradio, Overcast, Pocket Casts, Podbean, Podcast addict, Spotify, Stitcher, the Podcast app, Tunein, and apple podcast app!

Why Himalaya
It’s the top free podcast app to find and listen to new shows, episodes, and radio and to stream your favorite podcast shows whether it’s comedy podcasts, crime, educational podcasts or political and news podcasts. You can download the podcasts and episodes for free and listen to the latest podcasts offline. Don’t miss listening to some of the podcasts available on the app: The Joe Rogan Experience, NPR podcast, Serial, Dr. Phil podcast, My Favorite Murder, Bill O'Reilly, 8tracks, L.A. Times, The Rachel Maddow Show, Wondery, The New York Times podcast, Ted Talks, Dirty John, Bag Man, Dr. Death, Lore, The Daily podcast, BBC podcasts, Audio Bible, ASMR, Gimlet, BBC 

Featured On: 
"The 10 Best Podcast Player Apps for 2019" - PCMag
"The 8 Best Podcast Apps You Need To Download For 2019" - The Daily Dot
"Best Podcast App 2019" - TomsGuide
"The 10 Best Podcast Apps in 2019" - Paste Magazine

Himalaya will help you:
🎧Stay connected - easily stream your favorite podcasts through the free podcast player in one app  
🎧Stay informed - stay updated on the top podcasts for news, music, audiobook and radio
🎧Stay entertained - listen to millions of popular podcasts and get access to exclusive shows like Box of Oddities

How to stream and discover podcasts on Himalaya:
• Listen with one tap! Free podcast player perfect for commute, workout, chores, ASMR, lunch break
• Play podcasts while you fall asleep. Set a timer and listen as you doze off
• Create playlists and share your favorite podcasts with friends and family on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Messenger, Line, email & more
• Free podcast maker. Dive into the world of podcasting! Aspiring podcasters can create podcasts and share with the world! Visit himalaya.fm or himalaya.com for details

Tell us why you love Himalaya!
support@himalaya.com

If you want to listen to podcasts, radio, ASMR, audio bible, and audio books on our website player or on our podcasts app for iphone, check out wwww.himalaya.com
